All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, SysPropertyAdder
Direct Known Subclasses:
RunApplicationTask, StartApplication, StartDaemon
public abstract class DeployingTaskBase
extends SmartFrogTask

This class is used as an extended base for those tasks that do deployment, as it supports declaring of applications as nested elements. created 27-Feb-2004 15:27:47

getSubprocess

protected java.lang.String getSubprocess()
Get the subprocess we are deploying to. The default is DEFAULT_SUBPROCESS, though subclasses may override this

Returns:
the name of the subprocess to deployto

addCodebase

public void addCodebase(Codebase codebaseEntry)
Add a new codebase element to the current set. The URLs of the codebase will be visible to the deploying app.

Parameters:
codebaseEntry - a new codebase entry
